trans-unit.source: There is now side-by-side (SxS) module version support in Install-Module, Update-Module, and Publish-Module cmdlets that run in Windows PowerShell 5.0 or newer.
trans-unit.target: There is now side-by-side (SxS) module version support in Install-Module, Update-Module, and Publish-Module cmdlets that run in Windows PowerShell 5.0 or newer.

trans-unit.source: Also, we have added a -RequiredVersion parameter to the Publish-Module cmdlet to specify the version to be published.
trans-unit.target: Also, we have added a -RequiredVersion parameter to the Publish-Module cmdlet to specify the version to be published.

trans-unit.source: The Path parameter now supports the module base path with the version folder.
trans-unit.target: The Path parameter now supports the module base path with the version folder.

trans-unit.target: Contents of ModuleWithDependencies2 module manifest file:
